item.title: Recover etcd
item.description: Control Panel svr1 svr2 svr3 svr1 # Stop k8s # systemctl stop kubelet crictl rm -f $(crictl ps -q) start the etcd in single node # vim /etc/kubernetes/manifests/etcd.yaml - --force-new-cluster=true Add svr2 etcd to cluster # kubectl exec -it etcd-svr1.
